events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred yesterday afternoon on Main Street. They filed the claim to initiate the process.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under auto accident due to the description detailing vehicle damage from the collision.
An experienced claim agent was assigned to the case to ensure quick and efficient handling of the accident claim.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and outlining next steps in the claim process.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report to support the investigation of the collision.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos and official police report within the given timeframe.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to determine the extent of damages and liability.
Investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault, and the damage assessment was finalized accurately.
A settlement offer covering all repair costs was proposed to the customer in line with the investigation findings.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout.
The claim was officially approved, allowing the insurance process to move forward with payment issuance.
Payment for the approved settlement was successfully issued to the customer's repair vendor account.
The claim was closed after confirming payment receipt and customer confirmation of completed vehicle repairs.
All digital and physical claim files were archived securely for future reference or audit purposes.
